CustomField.description: This field shows the Opportunity Stage Name from the related Opportunity. If the value doesn't match predefined options, it displays "Other".
CustomField.formula: CASE(pse__Opportunity__r.StageName, "Incubate", "Incubate", "Qualified", "Qualified", "Trial", "Trial", "Proposal", "Proposal", "Decision", "Decision", "Purchase", "Purchase", "Closing", "Closing", "Orders Processing", "Orders Processing", "Ready to Ship", "Ready to Ship", "Closed Won", "Closed Won", "Closed Lost", "Closed Lost", "Return Cancelled", "Return Cancelled", "Return Created", "Return Created", "Return Initiated", "Return Initiated", "Return Label Sent", "Return Label Sent", "Products Processing", "Products Processing", "Finance Processing", "Finance Processing", "Refunded - Closed", "Refunded - Closed", "End of Life", "End of Life", "End of Life with Promo", "End of Life with Promo", "Partially Received", "Partially Received", "Other" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the Opportunity's Stage Name picklist value or "Other" if unmatched.
CustomField.label: Opportunity Stage
